'''Steven M. Kramer''' ([[1 March|March 1]], [[1948]]) is an American actor, primarily working in anime dubbing. He is often cast as the old mentor.

==Filmography==
* [[2004]] - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring]]'' - [[Gandalf]]
